name: OpiTopi
overview:
Founded in 2012, OpiTopi is a video opinions community where you can share your opinions, discuss your favorite topics, and get statistical Feedback on matters you really care about

Here’s how it works:

Just go to OpiTopi.com and register; it’s easy and free! You can even sign in with your Facebook or Twitter account!

Next, to start a discussion, just upload your video opinion on the topic of your choice. Ask the community a question and give them voting options. This will give you statistical feedback.

You don’t have to start a discussion to share your opinion. You can search for interesting topics and join in a discussion that has already been started.

Here are just some of the many ways you can use our site:

  • Share your opinions and knowledge with the entire community

  • Get feedback on ideas you may have

  • Search for interesting topics on anything from lifestyle to politics

    • Get real answers and meaningful statistics

What kinds of questions can you ask the community? How about:

  • Is organic farming sustainable?

  • Who is the greatest basketball player; Michael or Kobe?

    • Would you vote for me in American Idol?

    • Are global recycling efforts making any difference?

The possibilities are limitless!

Register for free to start joining in the discussions today!

OpiTopi.com: The whole community is waiting for your video opinion now!
